description.lang: AXIS M5065 PTZ Network Camera is an ultra-discreet, palm-sized, pan-tilt-zoom camera for remote indoor monitoring.It supports wireless input/output connectivity for communication with Z-Wave Plus devices. The ceiling-mount camera enables flexible coverage over a 400 m (4300 sq. ft) area with 180 pan, 90 tilt and 5x optical zoom. It provides full frame rate video in HDTV 1080p resolution, and supports multiple H.264 and Motion JPEG video streams. The IP51 rating ensures protection against dust and dripping water, enabling AXIS M5065 to operate even when a sprinkler system isactivated.> HDTV 1080p> Wireless input/output connectivity with Z-wave Plus> IP51-rated> Power over Ethernet (IEEE 802.3af)> Built-in analytics
